errors.error_description: In the 'Using Keyring on Ubuntu 16.04' section, the 'pip install' commands are executed before the virtual environment is activated with 'source py3/bin/activate'. This causes the packages to be installed in the global Python environment instead of the isolated virtual environment.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip install` commands after the `source py3/bin/activate` command.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `pip install` commands after the `source py3/bin/activate` command.
